title: [GAMEPLAY] Pentakill Karthus dance does not make any sound
body:
When you press the button for dance on Pentakill he throws his head back but does not make the rocker scream sounds he is supposed to make.  it happens everytime for me.

This is my favorite skin in my favorite champion.

replies.body:
Hey Rich Ryder - 

This is a bug that affects all skins and the base for Karthus. We're working to resolve this ASAP.
Thanks, I appreciate it and the work you all do.
